# zg.stock.scores

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/zac-garland/zg.stock.scores/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/zac-garland/zg.stock.scores/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of zg.stock.scores is to set up a refreshed pipeline for how I view / manage personal views on investments and equities within the US market.
